Title: Relates to reporting requirements of SUNY and CUNY
Summary: Relates to reporting requirements of SUNY and CUNY; relates to financial information and identifying vendor information of each contract; relates to a list of all foundation and state university employees by campus, department and location including salaries, job titles and descriptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to reporting requirements of the state university of New York and city university of New York
